name: project-insight
description: Project Insight is a Visual Studio Code extension that tracks coding time and analyzes project structure. It provides detailed statistics on file usage, lines of code, and time spent coding in different files. The extension offers a tree view in the sidebar for easy visualization of project metrics and file information. It uses a local database to persistently store coding data, allowing users to gain long-term insights into their coding patterns and project evolution.

projectAnalysis.excludeFolders.description: Folders to exclude from the analysis.

projectAnalysis.includeFolders.description: Specific folders to include in the analysis. If not empty, only these folders will be analyzed.

projectAnalysis.includeExtensions.description: File extensions to include in the analysis (e.g., [".js", ".ts"]). Leave empty to include all except excluded extensions.

projectAnalysis.excludeExtensions.description: File extensions to exclude from the analysis (e.g., [".md", ".json"]). Applied only when includeExtensions is empty.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
